faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our services

0.question: What services do you offer?
0.answer1: We currently focus on our **Creative Subscription (CaaS)** ‚Äî a managed creative team subscription for design, video, presentation, and localization.
0.answer2: Each plan includes PM, QA, and unlimited revisions under one predictable monthly fee. *(Talent-as-a-Service programs are available upon custom request).*

1.question: How does the subscription work?
1.answer1: Each subscription equals one or more active slots.
1.answer2: A slot is a managed workflow handled by a PM and creative team. You can submit unlimited requests via **Notion or Slack**, and your PM will assign and track progress for each project. Add more slots anytime for parallel production.

2.question: How fast is delivery?
2.answer1: Your PM reviews your brief within **4‚Äì6 hours** and coordinates your team. Typical first draft delivery:
2.answer6: Complex or multi-slot projects may take longer, scheduled by your PM for balanced output speed.

3.question: What if I don't like the design or result?
3.answer1: Every plan includes **unlimited revisions** within your slot.
3.answer2: Your PM and QA review feedback, coordinate revisions with the creative team, and refine until you're fully satisfied ‚Äî no extra cost, no time limit.

4.question: Do you support compliance reviews?
4.answer1: Yes. Our QA process includes **dual-check reviews** (PM + QA) to ensure deliverables meet quality and consistency standards.
4.answer2: For legal, regulatory, or brand compliance needs, we recommend sharing your guidelines during onboarding ‚Äî our team will apply them throughout production.

5.question: Can I use the trial content freely?
5.answer1: Absolutely. All content created during your **5-day free trial** (2 content pieces + 1 video) is yours to keep and use commercially.
5.answer2: You own 100% copyright and usage rights ‚Äî even if you don't continue with a paid subscription.

6.question: What format will I receive?
6.answer1: You'll receive **editable source files** plus final exports:
6.answer5: All files are organized in your shared Google Drive or delivered via your preferred method.

7.question: Is there a contract?
7.answer1: No long-term contracts. All plans run on a **flexible monthly subscription** ‚Äî pause, cancel, or upgrade anytime.
7.answer2: You're only committed to the current billing cycle. No penalties, no cancellation fees.

8.question: Can I pause my subscription?
8.answer1: Yes, absolutely. You can pause your plan anytime. While paused, your billing stops, and you can reactivate when ready ‚Äî ideal for seasonal campaigns or when you don't have ongoing creative work.

9.question: How do I submit requests?
9.answer1: Once onboarded, you'll receive access to your **Notion or Slack workspace** where you can create tasks, upload briefs, and set priorities.
9.answer2: Your PM manages the workflow, assigns the right designer or editor, and ensures everything stays transparent and on track.

introduction.title: Introduction and Acceptance
introduction.content: Welcome to Daily Drop. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Daily Drop.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: Daily Drop provides unlimited creative services including graphic design, video editing, web development, and content writing on a subscription basis. Services are delivered through our online platform. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time with or without notice.

subscriptionPayment.title: Subscription and Payment
subscriptionPayment.content: Our services are offered on a subscription basis with the following terms:

0.title: Subscription Plans
0.description: You can choose from Design, Design + Video, or Complete plans. All plans include a 7-day free trial.

1.title: Billing

2.title: Payment Methods
2.description: We accept major credit cards and debit cards. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

3.title: Price Changes
3.description: We reserve the right to change our pricing with 30 days notice. Existing subscribers will maintain their current rate until renewal.

However, we retain the right to showcase work in our portfolio unless you request otherwise. You may not resell or redistribute our services or deliverables to third parties.

deliveryRevisions.title: Delivery and Revisions
deliveryRevisions.content: Average turnaround times are 48 hours for design, 3-5 days for video, 3-7 days for development, and 24-48 hours for content. These are estimates and may vary based on complexity. All plans include unlimited revisions. However, revisions must be related to the original brief. New concepts or scope changes may be treated as new requests. We reserve the right to refuse unreasonable or abusive revision requests.

termination.title: Termination and Cancellation
termination.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellations take effect at the end of your current billing period. You will retain access to services until that date. privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: We take your privacy seriously. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Daily Drop ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our creative services platform. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, information we obtain automatically when you use our services, and information from third-party sources. The types of information we may collect include:

0.title: Personal Information
0.description: Name, email address, phone number, billing address, and payment information when you register for an account or subscribe to our services.

1.title: Project Information
1.description: Design briefs, content uploads, feedback, and communications related to your projects and requests.

2.title: Usage Data
2.description: Information about how you access and use our services, including your IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and time spent on our platform.

howWeUseInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process your transactions, communicate with you about your account and projects, send you marketing communications (with your consent), analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience, detect and prevent fraud or abuse, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We may share your information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processors and cloud storage providers; with professional team members working on your projects (designers, developers, writers); when required by law or to protect our rights; in connection with a business transaction such as a merger or acquisition; and with your consent or at your direction. We ensure all third parties are bound by confidentiality agreements.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption of data in transit and at rest, regular security assessments, access controls and authentication, secure payment processing through PCI-compliant providers, and regular backups and disaster recovery procedures. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

0.title: Access and Portability
0.description: Request access to your personal information and receive a copy in a portable format.

1.title: Correction
1.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information.

2.title: Deletion
2.description: Request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal obligations.

3.title: Restriction
3.description: Request restriction of processing of your personal information.

4.title: Objection
4.description: Object to processing of your personal information for certain purposes.

5.title: Withdraw Consent
5.description: Withdraw consent for processing where we rely on consent as the legal basis.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and store certain information. Cookies are files with small amounts of data. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our service. We use both session cookies (which expire when you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your device until deleted).

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or integrate with third-party services (such as payment processors, analytics providers, and communication tools). We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to read their privacy policies. We work with reputable service providers including Stripe for payments, Google Analytics for usage analytics, and Resend for email communications.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age (or 16 in the European Economic Area). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will delete such information from our systems.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, regulatory, or operational reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Privacy Policy.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.subtitle: Please review our payment terms and billing policies carefully.

acceptedPayments.title: Accepted Payment Methods
acceptedPayments.content: We accept all major credit cards and debit cards through our secure payment processor, Stripe. Payment methods include Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, Discover, Diners Club, and UnionPay. All payment information is encrypted and processed securely through industry-standard SSL technology.

billingCycle.title: Billing Cycle and Subscription Plans
billingCycle.content: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis according to your chosen plan:

0.title: Monthly Billing
0.description: Charged every 30 days from your subscription start date. Your billing date remains consistent each month.

1.title: Quarterly Billing
1.description: Charged every 90 days with a small discount. Ideal for medium-term projects.

2.title: Semi-Annual Billing
2.description: Charged every 6 months with additional savings. Best for long-term partnerships.

3.title: Automatic Renewal
3.description: All subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the next billing date.

freeTrial.title: 7-Day Free Trial
freeTrial.content: All new subscriptions include a 7-day free trial period. During this trial, you have full access to your chosen plan's features. You will not be charged until the trial period ends. To avoid charges, cancel before the trial ends. The trial is limited to one project or one week of service, whichever comes first.

pricing.title: Pricing and Plans
pricing.content: Our pricing is transparent and straightforward:

0.title: Slot-Based Pricing
0.description: Starting from $2,000/month per active slot. Each slot represents a dedicated PM-coordinated workflow.

1.title: Multi-Slot Discounts
1.description: Volume discounts available for teams subscribing to 3 or more slots simultaneously.

2.title: Currency Options
2.description: We bill in USD and KRW. Prices may vary based on exchange rates and local tax requirements.

3.title: Price Changes
3.description: We reserve the right to adjust pricing with 30 days advance notice. Existing subscribers maintain their rate until the next renewal period.

refunds.title: Refund and Non-Refundable Policy
refunds.content: All sales are final and non-refundable. We do not provide refunds for partial billing periods, unused time, or dissatisfaction with services. The 7-day free trial period allows you to evaluate our services risk-free before committing to a paid subscription. If you cancel during the trial, you will not be charged.

pauseCancellation.title: Pause and Cancellation Policy
pauseCancellation.content: You have full flexibility to manage your subscription:

0.title: Pause Subscription
0.description: Pause your subscription at any time. While paused, billing stops and you retain access until the end of your current period. Reactivate anytime to resume services.

1.title: Cancel Subscription
1.description: Cancel anytime before your next billing date. You retain full access until the end of your paid period. No refunds for remaining time.

2.title: Cancellation Process
2.description: Request cancellation through your Notion workspace or by emailing billing@dailydrop.com at least 24 hours before your renewal date.

paymentSecurity.title: Payment Security
paymentSecurity.content: Your payment information is fully secure. We use Stripe, a PCI-DSS Level 1 certified payment processor, to handle all transactions. We never store your complete credit card information on our servers. All payment data is encrypted using industry-standard 256-bit SSL encryption during transmission.

taxesInvoices.title: Taxes and Invoices
taxesInvoices.content: Prices do not include applicable taxes unless otherwise stated. You are responsible for any sales tax, VAT, GST, or other local taxes required in your jurisdiction. Invoices are automatically generated and sent to your registered email address after each successful payment. Invoices can also be accessed through your Notion workspace.

subscriptionChanges.title: Upgrading and Downgrading
subscriptionChanges.content: You can change your subscription plan at any time:

0.title: Upgrading
0.description: Upgrade to add more slots anytime. You will be charged a prorated amount for the remaining period.

1.title: Downgrading
1.description: Downgrade to fewer slots or a different plan. Changes take effect at your next billing cycle. No refunds for downgrades.

2.title: Plan Changes
2.description: Contact your PM or email billing@dailydrop.com to request plan changes.

latePayment.title: Late Payment and Failed Transactions
latePayment.content: If a payment fails, we will attempt to process it again within 3 days. If payment continues to fail, your account will be suspended until payment is successful. You will receive email notifications before suspension. During suspension, you cannot access services or submit new requests. Once payment is resolved, access is restored immediately.

disputeResolution.title: Payment Disputes and Chargebacks
disputeResolution.content: If you have concerns about a charge, please contact us at billing@dailydrop.com before initiating a chargeback. Chargebacks result in immediate account suspension and may incur additional fees. We will work with you to resolve any legitimate billing concerns promptly and fairly.
